Review Text: Absolutely delicious pizza, at a great price. No alcohol available, but don't let that put you off! Recommend the gorgonzola with spicy sausage. They also due huge as well as regular pizzas. Great stuff!

Name: PomoRosso

Name: PomoRosso
Review Text: Great place to have an authentic Italian Pizza. They give the best bang for the buck. Every single time. Friendly atmosphere and staff. Highly recommended. PS: They are not pricey. Its a hidden gem of Amsterdam.

Name: PomoRosso
Review Text:
If you are looking for a REAL italian pizza, this is the place you have to visit. Thin crust, quality ingredients and friendly staff.
Recommendations: Margherita followed by a coffee. ‚Ä¶

Name: PomoRosso
Review Text: The worst Canelloni I ever had, almost no spinach, dry ricotta cheese, half a portion and burned. The Lasagne was dominated by tomato sauce, almost no minced meat inside and no creamy white sauce. I wonder if the chef ever tasted these Italian dishes before cooking them?

Name: PomoRosso
Review Text: The only good Italian pizza in Amsterdam. I mean if you are used to Italian pizza in Italy then you will see what I mean. I have tried so many others so called original etc. but they are all adapted to what people call pizza, those greasy ‚Ä¶

Name: PomoRosso
Review Text:
Ordered thru uber and paid 20 eur for a pizza margarita 50cm. What I got is a tiny soggy pizza, a cold melanzano, and a small ( but yummy) caprese salad.
Quality price does not match. Very overrated. Don't do takeaway. Go there and eat fresh. They suck at takeaway. Feel ripped off!!!
